column5: A long time friend of mine asked if I might be able to help, her daughter is looking for work in the Cambridge area. She has a background in assembly and QC and would prefer to work in a production type environment. I have never met the daughter, can't vouch for her but I do have a copy of her resume so if anyone can help please PM me with your email address and I'll forward a copy to you by email.  Thanks  Big Cliff

Try  Trimaster MFG in Guelph its only 20 min from Cambridge lots of small assembly and QC work there not 100% if they are hireing but I worked at Trimaster for over 10 yrs and my wife going on 14yrs they hire alot of woman
Problem is, she doesn't have a car right now so she will have to stick closer to home but thanks for the feedback!
RIM in waterloo is always hiring.
